pageProduct.name: Antipodes Fresh Skin Favourites Baptise Gift Set
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Boost collagen,?hydrate dry skin and improve your skin’s radiance over time thanks to?this luxurious skincare set featuring 100% natural origin formulas.? 
??? 
In the set:? 
? 
Mini Hosanna H2O Intensive Skin-Plumping Serum (10ml)? 
A?certified organic and vegan?face serum?to?plump up skin?and boost collagen
? 
Baptise H2O Ultra-Hydrating Water Gel (60ml)? 
A?certified vegetarian?moisturising gel?with plant hyaluronic acid 
? 
Mini Avocado Pear Nourishing Night Cream (15ml)? 
A certified vegetarian?anti-aging cream?with organic avocado oil to?intensively?nourish the skin
? 
Suitable?for all skin types.??? 

Common Uses

Anti-Ageing, Dry Skin, Dehydrated Skin

Ingredients

 
Hosanna H2O Intensive Skin-Plumping Serum
Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) Hydrosol*, Aqua (Water), Naticide® (Parfum), Cyathea medullaris (Mamaku) Black Fern Leaf Extract, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Vitis vinifera (grape) Seed Extract, (Vinanza® Grape). Fragrance of French Rose & Cardamon: Citral, Citronellol, d-Limonene, Farnesol, Geraniol, Linalool. *Certified organic by BioGro
Baptise H2O Ultra-Hydrating Water Gel
Aqua (water), glycerine, sodium acrylates copolymer & lecithin, dehydroacetic acid, benzyl alcohol, glyceryl caprylate, polysorbate 20, hyaluronic acid (plant based), glycerine & water & Terminalia ferdinandiana (kakadu plum) fruit extract, sodium citrate, lysolecithin & sclerotium gum & xanthan gum & pullulan, Phormium tenax (harakeke) flax extract, Hibiscus sabdariffa (hibiscus) flower extract, Leptospermum scoparium mel (manuka) honey, Cyathea medullaris (mamaku black fern) extract, Zingiber officinale (ginger) root extract, Aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf extract, mica, titanium dioxide. Fragrance of Rose Anatolia: citral†, citronellol†, eugenol†, geraniol†, linalool†.
Avocado Pear Nourishing Night Cream
Aqua (Water), Squalane (Olive) Extract, Butyrospermum parkii (Shea) Butter, Glycerine, Leptospermum scoparium mel (NZ Manuka) Honey , Macadamia integrifolia (Macadamia) Nut Oil, Persea gratissima (Avocado Pear) Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Calendula officinalis (Calendula/Marigold) Flower Oil, Cocos nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Lecithin, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Helianthus annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Bisabolol, Vitis vinifera (grape) Seed Extract, (Vinanza® Grape). Fragrance of Sandalwood, Ylang Ylang & Patchouli: Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Citronellol, d-Limonene, Eugenol, Farnesol, Geraniol, Isoeugenol, Linalool.
Plump up skin?in the morning by applying?Hosanna to freshly cleansed skin. Follow by massaging Baptise generously into face, neck and décolletage. Complete your night skincare routine with Avocado Pear, to intensively?hydrate skin and awaken to a fresh, healthy glow. 

Directions

Plump up skin in the morning by applying Hosanna to freshly cleansed skin. Follow by massaging Baptise generously into face, neck and décolletage. Complete your night skincare routine with Avocado Pear, to intensively hydrate skin and awaken to a fresh, healthy glow.
